targetLine.text: I know. I know. I know, Doc.
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: The Skyway's jammed. It's gonna take us forever to get there. And this stays here. I didn't invent the time machine to win at gambling; I invented the time machine to travel through time.

contextAfter.text: So, Doc Brown invented a time machine.
